Posts.EditableText:
Hello! I have been creating a timer for my game, and it works as intended, but a error message pops up.

Error message: Error running script: No parameters passed to EnableTimer function - expected 1 parameters

Ill show you the code im using for my timer:

if (game.pov.parent = Room) {
msg ("Message.")
MoveObject (Person, Room)
DisableTimer (timer)
}

Help would be much appreciated, thank you!
Posts.HTML:
Hello! I have been creating a timer for my game, and it works as intended, but a error message pops up.

Error message: Error running script: No parameters passed to EnableTimer function - expected 1 parameters

Ill show you the code im using for my timer:

if (game.pov.parent = Room) {
msg ("Message.")
MoveObject (Person, Room)
DisableTimer (timer)
}

Help would be much appreciated, thank you!

Posts.EditableText: Does the error message pop up when you leave the room?  When the timer expires?  Or other?
Posts.HTML: Does the error message pop up when you leave the room? When the timer expires? Or other?

Posts.EditableText: The error message says the problem is with the `EnableTimer` function. So the code you need to look at is where the line with `EnableTimer` is.
Posts.HTML: The error message says the problem is with the EnableTimer function. So the code you need to look at is where the line with EnableTimer is.
